attributes.action: moderate the amount of petitions on this website
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe the amount of silly petitions on this site is increasing, and need moderation. there is a petition to outlaw the sale of snails at markets as it is 'cruel', a petition to outlaw the sale of snail poison, a petition to have all old peoples drivers licenses revoked at the age of 55, a petition to have town speed limits reduced to 10mph, have all speed limits removed, have a national holiday 3 times a week etc etc

i find these quite annoying and tedious and feel they should be stopped

rejection.details: We will treat this as feedback.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
